ComicInfo.Summary:
Daniel helps Charlie and Katie break free of the zombie horde and we find Charlie is hiding a big secret from everyone.
Maureen and Jasper meet up with Jenny and Samantha,
they all head back home to report and recover from the last mission
ComicInfo.Title: Homeward Bound
